import React, {useState} from 'react'; import MoreOptionsBase from './MoreOptionsBase'; import MoreOptionsBonus from './MoreOptionsBonus'; import MoreOptionsEquity from './MoreOptionsEquity'; import MoreOptionsPerks from './MoreOptionsPerks'; export const CalculatorControls = props => { updateBase = () => { props.setbaseSalary = window.baseSalary; } return(
${parseInt(props.baseSalary)} props.setbaseSalary(event.target.value) } />
${parseInt(props.bonusAmount)} props.setbonusAmount(event.target.value) } />
${parseInt(props.equityValue)} props.setequityValue(event.target.value) } />
${props.perksValue} props.setperksValue(event.target.value) } />
); }
